task.title: Debug dashboard send injection to spawned worker

events.content: Omit <system-reminder> on delivery retries: Omit <system-reminder> on delivery retries

raw.question: Omit <system-reminder> on delivery retries
raw.reasoning: Echo verification retries were re-injecting full reminder blocks, causing repeated reminder spam; keep reminders on first delivery only.

retrospective.summary: Reduced system-reminder spam by omitting reminder wrapper on delivery retries while keeping it on first injection.
